title: Megami-sama Kourin! = Hi Nichi Jouda to Omotta? - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Goddesses   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 白河勇人
description:
One day, a goddess appears in front of Toya Hizuki, a second year high school student who is bored every day but thinks “school is this kind of thing”. “Savior!”, “Hah?”.

According to the Goddess, because of the demon who fell in love with Touya, he couldn’t connect with the [destined person] and even the people involved wouldn’t be happy. I was given the task of fixing the future, and I was supposed to play a supporting role, but Misumi Saki, the perfect queen who is de S!? Different than I thought I was struggling to flip a classmate’s skirt! Goddess, when will the extraordinary begin!? A teen romantic comedy that’s more than everyday and less than fantasy, mission begins!!>
